items.title: Unity 3D: Car Driving And First Person Shooter Game
items.headline: Most popular 2D and 3D game engine
objectives_summary: Begin your 2D and 3D journey in Unity. In this course we will cover everything you need to know about unity including colliders, physics, animating characters and much more. If you want to begin you game development journey then this course is best for you. We will start from very basics and move towards making your first game in unity 3D. Unity is a powerful cross platform game engine. It makes game development so easier. With a press of button you can build games for multiple platforms.
